attributes.action: REVIEW SOCIAL SECURITY PAYMENTS TO NON UK CITIZENS
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the UK government to review all UK legislation to ensure that the UK stops making unnecessarySocial Security payments and giving free medical service to Non UK Citizens.

It is understood that the UK is making payments to EU Citizens that other EU Nations would not pay to UK Citizens.

The UK Government should also review its EU citizen immigration policy.  No entry without guaranteed work or a sponsor.
